$950 / 1br - 890ft² - HIGH PARK 1 BED RM (BLOOR & KEELE) (map)

Date: 2012-03-08, 9:26PM EST
Reply to: marckyoo7@hotmail.com [Errors when replying to ads?]

Available for March 7th 2012 and on or April 1st 2012. $950 all inclusive

For day, evening and weekend viewings contact:
MARK AT 416 824 1400

One bedroom bacement apartment situated at the foot of HighPark at 582 Indian Rd. and seconds from major highways and close to all amenities and public transit.
Offering spacious living quarters approximately 850 sp ft, complete with hardwood floors and ceramics tiles throughout, New 28 inch fridge. 4 appliances, living room area, a four piece bathroom, double closets in bedroom -bed rm 9ft by 18ft, entrance closet and free laundry and cable.


Located a few blocks from High Park, the largest park in Toronto, you have cultural, sporting & educational facilities all at your disposal. For those who wish to stay fit, High Park has many great trails ideal for jogging & cycling and for the sports enthusiast there are baseball & soccer fields as well as tennis courts available.
With its gently rolling hills, winding streets, towering oak trees, & beautiful gardens this neighbourhood enchants and delights all those who live here.

This home is situated in the picturesque High Park neighbourhood, a charming community with a wealth of history. It is conveniently located within walking distance of Bloor West Village, one of the most popular shopping districts in Toronto. The Village is known across the City for its European bakeries, delicatessens, specialty food shops, and cafes. You are also very close to Roncesvalles Village; with its charming restaurants and trendy shops and lets not forget The Junction Village which is another strip with restaurants and shops. You are in the middle of a beautiful location surrounded by villages to meet your daily needs. Further, each village in the summer has a weekend festival which is renowned throughout Toronto and surroundings and also, Wanda St. which is a couple houses away from here has a street party once a year hosted by Tyler Stewart from The Bear Naked Ladies band who's house is directly across from you.

With the TTC only steps away, 24 hours, 7 days a week; getting around town is a breeze. Come join a beautiful community to live and a rich history to enjoy.


582 INDIAN RD (google map) (yahoo map)
